title: 求教地皮世界生成教好之后给10q币
author: 1451599023zhao

replies.author: kjzhou123
replies.txt_content: 提示: 该帖被管理员或版主屏蔽

replies.author: LS_jie
replies.txt_content:
首先需要下载Plotme(地皮)插件和Multiverse-Core(多世界-核心)插件
然后在游戏里输入/mv create plotworld normal -g PlotMe就行了

replies.author: 我的世界城市服
replies.txt_content:
/mv create plotworld normal -g PlotMe</font>
/mw create plotworld plugin:PlotMe
